Body:
torch.testing.assert_allclose(utils.neighbours_extraction(self.
    indexed_matrix).type(torch.float), self.neighbours_indices_hex)
torch.testing.assert_allclose(utils.neighbours_extraction(self.
    indexed_matrix, kernel_type='Hex', dilation=2).type(torch.float), self.
    neighbours_indices_hex_dilated)
torch.testing.assert_allclose(utils.neighbours_extraction(self.
    indexed_matrix, kernel_type='Pool').type(torch.float), self.
    neighbours_indices_pool)
torch.testing.assert_allclose(utils.neighbours_extraction(self.
    indexed_matrix, kernel_type='Square', radius=0, stride=2).type(torch.
    float), self.neighbours_indices_one)
torch.testing.assert_allclose(utils.neighbours_extraction(self.
    indexed_matrix, kernel_type='Hex', radius=3, retina=True).type(torch.
    float), self.neighbours_indices_retina_hex_3)
